about_the_game:
Sliding Bears: The Ultimate Bear-on-Ice Bumper Adventure!

Get ready to slip, slide, and collide iin this chaotic, fun-filled arcade experience! Sliding Bears brings you the wacky world of adorable bears battling it out on an icy rink. The goal is simple: bump, trap, and knock your opponents off the ice to reign supreme. Whether you're playing with family, friends, or want to challenge your rival in a local multiplayer showdown, Sliding Bears is the perfect blend of easy controls, wild gameplay, and endless fun! (Yes. Endless. Fun.)

Features:

🐻 Un-bear-ably Cute Characters – Choose your favorite bear and get ready for the showdown !

❄️ Chaotic Ice-Sliding Action – Bumping your friends off the ice has never been so satisfying! Just watch out for your own traps… unless you enjoy being the punchline.

🎮 Several gameplays – Spice up your game with the new crown mode!

🌟 Three Levels of Difficulty – Start easy and work your way up to facing tougher AI bears. Think you’ve mastered the game? Let’s see about that.

⚡ Fast-Paced Action – Easy to pick up and play, with rounds that last just a few minutes—perfect for quick gaming sessions or longer play marathons!

🎉 Family-Friendly Fun – Designed for all ages, Sliding Bears guarantees laughter and entertainment, whether you’re playing with kids, friends, or at a chill game night.

🌍 Available Worldwide on Steam – Because everyone deserves to play chaotic bear battles on ice! By the way, the game is translated in 11 languages!

Ready to take on the challenge? Download Sliding Bears now and bear witness to a crazy showdown!

short_description: Slide alone or with a friend! The polar bear cubs have come out to play and they have decided to have fun on the ice with a single objective in mind: be the last one standing! Use item boxes to counter your foes' victory and be the winner!
supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Spanish - Latin America, Dutch, Polish, Portuguese - Brazil, Portuguese - Portugal, Korean, Japanese
